tossupQ:
CHEMISTRY  Short Answer  What is the scientific term for the ratio between the density of a 
given substance to that of water when both are at the same temperature?
bonusQ:
CHEMISTRY  Multiple Choice  Which of the following pure substances has the highest melting 
point at 1 atmosphere of pressure: 
 
W)  magnesium oxide 
X)  diamond 
Y)  sodium chloride 
Z)  cesium chloride
bonusA:
X)  DIAMOND 
 
(Solution: MgO = 2800ºC; diamond = 3550ºC;  NaCl = 801ºC;  Cs = 645ºC)
